meanings.definition: A plant belonging to the class Dicotyledonae, characterized by having two seed leaves.
meanings.sent1: The dicotyls in the garden are growing well.
meanings.sent2: Farmers often plant dicotyls in their fields.
meanings.sent3: The dicotyls had a party and invited all the other plants.
meanings.sent4: Her love for dicotyls blossomed like a beautiful garden.
meanings.sent5: The dicotyls swayed gracefully in the breeze, showing off their two seed leaves.

meanings.definition: The group of flowering plants that have two seed leaves.
meanings.sent1: Dicotyls provide important habitats for insects.
meanings.sent2: Many dicotyls bloom in the springtime.
meanings.sent3: The dicotyls formed a band and played music for the bees.
meanings.sent4: In the garden of life, dicotyls are the colorful dancers.
meanings.sent5: Children love to learn about dicotyls with their two seed leaves.
